contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox newspaper | name = Pasadena Star-News | logo = | image = | caption = | type = Daily newspaper | format = [[Broadsheet]] | owners = [[Los Angeles Newspaper Group]] | founder = | publisher = | editor = | chiefeditor = | assoceditor = | maneditor = | newseditor = | managingeditordesign = | campuseditor = | campuschief = | opeditor = | sportseditor = | photoeditor = | staff = | foundation = | political = | language = | ceased publication = | headquarters = [[Pasadena, California]] | circulation = | sister newspapers = ''[[Los Angeles Daily News]]'' <br>''[[San Gabriel Valley Tribune]]''<br>''[[Whittier Daily News]]'' | ISSN = | oclc = | website = {{URL|http://pasadenastarnews.com/|pasadenastarnews.com}} }} The '''''Pasadena Star-News''''' is the local daily newspaper for [[Pasadena, California]]. The ''Star-News'' is a member of the [[Los Angeles Newspaper Group]], since 1996. It is also part of the San Gabriel Valley Newspaper Group, along with the ''[[San Gabriel Valley Tribune]]'' and the ''[[Whittier Daily News]]''. First published in 1884, the paper was originally located at the corner of Colorado Boulevard and Oakland Avenue for years. That building is now home to [[Le Cordon Bleu|Technique at Le Cordon Bleu College of Culinary Arts]] and [[24 Hour Fitness]]. Ridder Newspapers bought the ''Star-News'' in 1956 and [[Bernard J. Ridder]] took over as publisher. Ridder merged with Knight to form [[Knight Ridder]] in 1974. The paper was sold off in 1989 to a company owned by [[William Dean Singleton]]; the [[Thomson Corporation]] bought majority control of the paper a year later. Thomson sold the ''Star-News'' to Singleton's [[MediaNews Group]] in 1996, which went on to become part of the Los Angeles Newspaper Group. The newspaper also publishes the ''Rose Magazine''.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.therosemag.com/issues/parade_2011/ |title=About Us |work=Rose Magazine |accessdate=24 August 2011}}</ref> ==Previous owners== * [[William F. Prisk]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://pasadenastarnews.com ''Pasadena Star-News'' website] {{MediaNews Group}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Pasadena Star-News}} [[Category:Newspapers published in California]] [[Category:Newspapers published in the Greater Los Angeles Area]] [[Category:Media in Pasadena, California]] [[Category:Publications established in 1905]] {{California-newspaper-stub}}
